pos.description: Defines position on the associated LinearElement

x.description: Defines the x coordiante value, mapping to each EPSG-code

y.description: Defines the y coordiante value, mapping to each EPSG-code

z.description: Defines the z coordiante value, mapping to each EPSG-code

accPos.description: absolute accuracy as 1sigma. Use 0 if not defined

accX.description: absolute accuracy as 1sigma. Use 0.0 if not defined

accY.description: absolute accuracy as 1sigma. Use 0.0 if not defined

accZ.description: absolute accuracy as 1sigma. Use 0.0 if not defined
